title: Cornsilk B
description: Open weave with a variety of yarns and textures, Vertical stripes form the basic weave pattern, larger horizontal stripes created with bulky chenille in contrasting color. Warp:Orange, green, gold, white. Weft:Orange, metallic gold, white. Attached  8.5 x 11\" manilla mat folder. Outside \"Group IV\"  Inside reads \"Cornsilk B Gilded, SCY/12B/1, 52\", silk, viscose, cotton, jute. Machine edged all 4 sides. (oranges, yellow, white, gold metallic)
